title: 575 59 "Z's Ambition! Lily the Little Giant!"Transliteration: "Zetto no Yabō-hen - Chiisana Kyojin Rirī!" (Japanese:Zの野望編 小さな巨人リリー！) Aya Komaki Hirohiko Kamisaka December 2, 2012(2012-12-02) August 21, 2022
transformers_text: 575 59 Z's Ambition Lily the Little Giant Transliteration Z et to no Ya b hen Chi is an a Kyo j in Rir Japanese Z Aya Ko maki Hiro hi ko Kami saka December 2 2012 2012 12 02 August 21 2022 There is a whole fleet of Neo Marine ships one of which houses A in and Bins The Straw Hats fight back against a fleet of Marine ships but it turns out to be a mirage Huge raindrops appear out of nowhere and the water suddenly splits The Straw Hats wake up with different clothes However Sanji sees that the food he cooked is gone so he blames it on Luffy Us opp and Chopper until Chopper wonders if the sea is haunted Suddenly the food begins to be eaten very quickly Luffy finds the person who ate the food and it turns out to be a little girl She attacks the Straw Hats and they fight back It is then revealed that she ate the Mini Mini no Mi and that her name is Lily She turns out to be a giant though her devil fruit makes her small She befriends the Straw Hats after they save her from drowning and wants to see her dad this is why she invaded the Marine's fleet of ships She then talks about food to Luffy On the Neo Marines ' ship A in calls Shuzo and asks why he was not there Shuzo tells A in that he will make a better second in command and that he is going after Lily's father The Straw Hats see Marine ships coming their way who have Lily's father captive They are heading towards Impel Down so Luffy declares battle against the Marines
